name: Steel Tanks vs Zombie: The Iron War
name_original: Steel Tanks vs Zombie: The Iron War
description:
The Iron World War is here!
Race across the city with your steel tank and smash as many zombies as you can!
Drive your tank fast on the highway killing all the stupid zombies!
Don't let the furious zombies interfere on your tank race and smash them all!
Drive your steel tank in this free endless racing game and survive the zombie waves!
Features:
-Endless racing game.
-Free game.
-Amazing 3D graphics.
-Challenging gameplay.
Are you scared about zombies? Download Steel Tanks vs Zombie: The Iron War now!
